metadata.title: CVE-2024-23851 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: copy_params in drivers/md/dm-ioctl.c in the Linux kernel through 6.7.1 canattempt to allocate more than INT_MAX bytes, and crash, because of amissing param_kernel->data_size check. This is related to ctl_ioctl.
